tutorial.firstparagraph: To run your project locally, on your own machine, you need to have DLHub Gateway installed on your machine. Please find it on PYPI. Open a new command-line console in your computer, and run the DLHub Gateway using the following command:
tutorial.thirdparagraph: You can continue without connecting to the DLHub gateway, but in this case the app will not be able to run the codes, and it only works as a code generator.
